Explain Broken.description: Explain what is wrong with the code

Refactor This.description: Refactors the code to be more readable

Code Me This.description: Generate code based on the comment

Generate Gradle Config.description: The prompt to generate the content of the gradle config

Generate Page Object.description: Using the given url and the list of xpath to generate page model

Generate Step Definitions.description: To generate step definitions using the page object content and BDD scenarious
